page.title: 19Recreation, Religion
page.content: RECREATION; A syndicate fishes in the King's Fleet. People sail and water ski on the River deben. Some residents own their own riding horses. Bird watching is popular.Some houses have their own swimming pools, Rambling is popular especially at weekends. RELIGION:Each village has its own old church but they share the same minister who lives at Kirton rectory. The old Vicarage at Falkenham has been sold and is now privately owned as has the Old Rectory at Kirton. There are two lay readers. Anglican church services are as follows:- Kirton - Sun 10am 6.30pm Wed 930am Falkenham-Sun 9am or 1130am Kiro Club ( Sunday School for Children up to 10 years in cluding creche) Sunday 10am Kirton Church Hall
